author: cutiehoneyzu (McHilo)
title: [新聞] 杜拜救難人員拯救受困於洪水的貓咪
content: Heartwarming moment cat is rescued from Dubai floods after desperately clinging to door of car submerged by water杜拜大洪水，貓咪爬到車門把手被救難人員拯救每日郵報記者Taryn Pedler and Chris JewersThis is the heartwarming moment a cat was rescued from deep waters following the freak flash flooding and storms that have lashed Dubai over the last two days.這真是暖心時刻，一隻貓深陷於洪水中被救，杜拜已經好幾天遭受豪雨侵襲In footage shared to X, formerly Twitter, a black and white feline can be seen hanging onto a car door handle as flood waters lap around it.在社群軟體X,一隻賓士貓依附在被水淹沒的車門With drenched, flattened fur, the cat is filmed wide-eyed as it looks around at its rescuer - still clinging on to the submerged vehicle.被浸濕的貓，依附在車門，張著大眼不斷期待有人救牠A hero police officer makes his way through the water in a small inflatable boat until he reaches the stranded pet, before leaning over to pull it off the door.一個英勇的警員，駕著小艇，把那隻貓帶離那裡

post_comment.comment_content: 笑死  杜拜看來也只是金玉其外
伊斯蘭國家 貓很神聖吧
下個雨就跟台北一樣淹水
